Package structure

Class User

java.lang.Object
structure.User
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
The class User instance represents an Account which stores the users informations and provides needed methods to interact.
Since:
1.0
Version:
4.0
Author:
Cloudy Young, Jimschenchen

      private java.lang.String sessionId
      The session id of the account. For the server requests to be proceeded properly.

    • password

      private java.lang.String password
      The password of the account.

    • authenticated

      private boolean authenticated
      The authentication status of the account. true represents the instance user is authenticated with the server successfully. false otherwise.

    • existing

      private boolean existing
      A boolean to indicate if the account is existing on the server.

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> availability
      A list of int to storage the available hours which user plans to strive per day

      The current theme name
